price: Abin da yake a cikin sammai da wanda yake a cikin ƙasã sunã tasbĩhi ga Allah. Gare Shi mulki yake, kuma gare Shi gõdiya take. Kuma Shi, a kan kõme, Mai ikon yi ne.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi lahu al-mul'ku walahu al-ḥamdu wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
